00188 UINT32 AddFilesToPlayersLog(UINT8 ubCode, UINT32 uiDate, UINT8 ubFormat, STR8 pFirstPicFile, STR8 pSecondPicFile )
00189 {
00190       // adds Files item to player's log(Files List), returns unique id number of it
00191       // outside of the Files system(the code in this .c file), this is the only function you'll ever need
00192   UINT32 uiId=0;
00193 
00194       // if not in Files mode, read in from file
00195       if(!fInFilesMode)
00196    OpenAndReadFilesFile( );
00197   
00198       // process the actual data
00199   uiId = ProcessAndEnterAFilesRecord(ubCode, uiDate, ubFormat ,pFirstPicFile, pSecondPicFile, FALSE );
00200       
00201       // set unread flag, if nessacary
00202       CheckForUnreadFiles( );
00203 
00204       // write out to file if not in Files mode
00205       if(!fInFilesMode)
00206    OpenAndWriteFilesFile( );
00207 
00208       // return unique id of this transaction
00209       return uiId;
00210 }

00356 BOOLEAN LoadFiles( void )
00357 {
00358   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00359   // load files video objects into memory
00360 
00361       // title bar
00362   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00363       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\programtitlebar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00364       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTITLE));
00365   
00366       // top portion of the screen background
00367       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00368       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\fileviewer.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00369       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTOP));
00370   
00371 
00372       // the highlight
00373   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00374       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\highlight.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00375       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiHIGHLIGHT));
00376 
00377       // top portion of the screen background
00378       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00379       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\fileviewerwhite.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00380       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFileBack));
00381 
00382       return (TRUE);
00383 }

00400 UINT32 ProcessAndEnterAFilesRecord( UINT8 ubCode, UINT32 uiDate, UINT8 ubFormat ,STR8 pFirstPicFile, STR8 pSecondPicFile, BOOLEAN fRead )
00401 {
00402   UINT32 uiId=0;
00403   FilesUnitPtr pFiles=pFilesListHead;
00404   
00405       // add to Files list
00406       if(pFiles)
00407       {
00408             while(pFiles)
00409             {
00410       // check to see if the file is already there
00411                   if(pFiles->ubCode==ubCode)
00412                   {
00413                         // if so, return it's id number
00414                         return ( pFiles->uiIdNumber );
00415                   }
00416 
00417                   // next in the list
00418                   pFiles = pFiles->Next;
00419             }
00420     
00421             // reset pointer
00422             pFiles=pFilesListHead;
00423 
00424             // go to end of list
00425             while(pFiles->Next)
00426             {           
00427                   pFiles = pFiles->Next;
00428             }
00429             // alloc space
00430             pFiles->Next = (files *) MemAlloc(sizeof(FilesUnit));
00431             
00432             // increment id number
00433             uiId = pFiles->uiIdNumber + 1;
00434             
00435             // set up information passed
00436             pFiles = pFiles->Next;
00437             pFiles->Next = NULL;
00438             pFiles->ubCode = ubCode;
00439             pFiles->uiDate = uiDate;
00440     pFiles->uiIdNumber = uiId;
00441             pFiles->ubFormat = ubFormat;
00442             pFiles->fRead = fRead;
00443       }
00444       else
00445       {
00446             // alloc space
00447             pFiles = (FilesUnitPtr) MemAlloc(sizeof(FilesUnit));
00448     
00449             // setup info passed
00450             pFiles->Next = NULL;
00451             pFiles->ubCode = ubCode;
00452             pFiles->uiDate = uiDate;
00453     pFiles->uiIdNumber = uiId;
00454         pFilesListHead = pFiles;
00455             pFiles->ubFormat=ubFormat;
00456             pFiles -> fRead = fRead;
00457       }
00458 
00459       // null out ptr's to picture file names
00460   pFiles -> pPicFileNameList[0] = NULL;
00461       pFiles -> pPicFileNameList[1] = NULL;
00462 
00463       // copy file name strings
00464 
00465       // first file
00466       if(pFirstPicFile)
00467       {
00468         if((pFirstPicFile[0]) != 0)
00469             {
00470       pFiles -> pPicFileNameList[0] = (STR8) MemAlloc(strlen(pFirstPicFile) + 1 );
00471           strcpy( pFiles -> pPicFileNameList[0], pFirstPicFile);
00472                   pFiles -> pPicFileNameList[0][strlen(pFirstPicFile)] = 0;
00473             }
00474       }
00475 
00476       // second file  
00477   
00478       if(pSecondPicFile)
00479       {
00480         if((pSecondPicFile[0]) != 0) 
00481             {
00482           pFiles->pPicFileNameList[1] = (STR8) MemAlloc(strlen(pSecondPicFile) + 1 );
00483           strcpy( pFiles->pPicFileNameList[1], pSecondPicFile);
00484                   pFiles->pPicFileNameList[1][ strlen( pSecondPicFile ) ] = 0;
00485             }
00486       }
00487 
00488       // return unique id
00489       return uiId;
00490 }
00491 
00492 void OpenAndReadFilesFile( void )
00493 {
00494   // this procedure will open and read in data to the finance list
00495   HWFILE hFileHandle;
00496   UINT8 ubCode;
00497       UINT32 uiDate;
00498   INT32 iBytesRead=0;
00499   UINT32 uiByteCount=0;
00500   CHAR8 pFirstFilePath[128];
00501   CHAR8 pSecondFilePath[128];
00502   UINT8 ubFormat;
00503       BOOLEAN fRead;
00504 
00505       // clear out the old list
00506       ClearFilesList( );
00507 
00508       // no file, return
00509       if ( ! (FileExists( FILES_DAT_FILE ) ) )
00510             return;
00511 
00512       // open file
00513       hFileHandle=FileOpen( FILES_DAT_FILE,( FILE_OPEN_EXISTING |  FILE_ACCESS_READ ), FALSE );
00514 
00515       // failed to get file, return
00516       if(!hFileHandle)
00517       {
00518             return;
00519   }
00520 
00521       // make sure file is more than 0 length
00522   if ( FileGetSize( hFileHandle ) == 0 )
00523       {
00524     FileClose( hFileHandle );
00525             return;
00526       }
00527  
00528       // file exists, read in data, continue until file end
00529   while( FileGetSize( hFileHandle ) > uiByteCount)
00530       {
00531     
00532             // read in data
00533     FileRead( hFileHandle, &ubCode, sizeof(UINT8), (UINT32 *)&iBytesRead );
00534             
00535             FileRead( hFileHandle, &uiDate, sizeof(UINT32), (UINT32 *)&iBytesRead );
00536       
00537     FileRead( hFileHandle, &pFirstFilePath,  128, (UINT32 *)&iBytesRead );
00538     
00539     FileRead( hFileHandle, &pSecondFilePath,  128, (UINT32 *)&iBytesRead );
00540 
00541             FileRead( hFileHandle, &ubFormat,  sizeof(UINT8), (UINT32 *)&iBytesRead );
00542 
00543             FileRead( hFileHandle, &fRead,  sizeof(UINT8), (UINT32 *)&iBytesRead );
00544             // add transaction
00545         ProcessAndEnterAFilesRecord(ubCode, uiDate, ubFormat,pFirstFilePath, pSecondFilePath, fRead);
00546 
00547             // increment byte counter
00548         uiByteCount += sizeof( UINT32 ) + sizeof( UINT8 )+ 128 + 128 + sizeof(UINT8) + sizeof( BOOLEAN );
00549       } 
00550       
00551   // close file 
00552       FileClose( hFileHandle );
00553       
00554       return;
00555 }
00556 
00557 
00558 BOOLEAN OpenAndWriteFilesFile( void )
00559 {
00560   // this procedure will open and write out data from the finance list
00561   HWFILE hFileHandle;
00562   INT32 iBytesWritten=0;
00563   FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead;
00564       CHAR8 pFirstFilePath[128];
00565   CHAR8 pSecondFilePath[128];
00566   
00567       memset(&pFirstFilePath, 0, sizeof( pFirstFilePath ) );
00568       memset(&pSecondFilePath, 0, sizeof( pSecondFilePath ) );
00569 
00570       if( pFilesList != NULL )
00571       {
00572             if(pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[0])
00573             {
00574                   strcpy(pFirstFilePath, pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[0]);
00575             }
00576             if(pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[1])
00577             {
00578                   strcpy(pSecondFilePath, pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[1]);
00579             }
00580       }
00581             
00582       // open file
00583       hFileHandle=FileOpen( FILES_DAT_FILE, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE|FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE);
00584 
00585       // if no file exits, do nothing
00586       if(!hFileHandle)
00587       {
00588             return ( FALSE );
00589   }
00590   // write info, while there are elements left in the list
00591   while(pFilesList)
00592       {
00593       // now write date and amount, and code
00594     FileWrite( hFileHandle, &(pFilesList->ubCode),  sizeof ( UINT8 ), NULL );  
00595             FileWrite( hFileHandle, &(pFilesList->uiDate),  sizeof ( UINT32 ), NULL );
00596     FileWrite( hFileHandle, &(pFirstFilePath),  128, NULL );
00597     FileWrite( hFileHandle, &(pSecondFilePath),  128, NULL );
00598     FileWrite( hFileHandle, &(pFilesList->ubFormat), sizeof(UINT8), NULL );
00599             FileWrite( hFileHandle, &(pFilesList->fRead), sizeof(UINT8), NULL );
00600 
00601             // next element in list
00602             pFilesList = pFilesList->Next;
00603       
00604       }
00605 
00606       // close file
00607   FileClose( hFileHandle );
00608   // clear out the old list
00609       ClearFilesList( );
00610 
00611       return ( TRUE );
00612 }
00613 
00614 void ClearFilesList( void )
00615 {
00616       // remove each element from list of transactions
00617   FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead;
00618   FilesUnitPtr pFilesNode=pFilesList;
00619 
00620       // while there are elements in the list left, delete them
00621       while( pFilesList )
00622       {
00623     // set node to list head
00624             pFilesNode=pFilesList;
00625             
00626             // set list head to next node
00627             pFilesList=pFilesList->Next;
00628     
00629             // if present, dealloc string
00630     if(pFilesNode->pPicFileNameList[0])
00631             {
00632               MemFree(pFilesNode->pPicFileNameList[0]);
00633             }
00634 
00635     if(pFilesNode->pPicFileNameList[1])
00636             {
00637       MemFree(pFilesNode->pPicFileNameList[1]);
00638             }
00639             // delete current node
00640             MemFree(pFilesNode);
00641       }
00642   pFilesListHead=NULL;
00643       return;
00644 }

00661 void DisplayFilesList( void )
00662 {
00663   // this function will run through the list of files of files and display the 'sender' 
00664       FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead; 
00665   INT32 iCounter=0;
00666   HVOBJECT hHandle;
00667  
00668   
00669       // font stuff
00670   SetFont(FILES_TEXT_FONT);
00671   SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
00672       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
00673       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
00674 
00675       // runt hrough list displaying 'sender'
00676       while((pFilesList))//&&(iCounter < MAX_FILES_LIST_LENGTH))
00677       {
00678             if (iCounter==iHighLightFileLine)
00679             {
00680        // render highlight
00681       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiHIGHLIGHT);
00682       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, FILES_SENDER_TEXT_X - 5, iScreenHeightOffset + ( ( iCounter + 9 ) * BLOCK_HEIGHT) + ( iCounter * 2 ) - 4 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00683        
00684             }
00685     
00686             mprintf(FILES_SENDER_TEXT_X, iScreenHeightOffset + (( iCounter + 9 ) * BLOCK_HEIGHT) + ( iCounter * 2 ) - 2 ,pFilesSenderList[pFilesList->ubCode]);
00687             iCounter++;
00688             pFilesList=pFilesList->Next;
00689       }
00690  
00691       // reset shadow
00692       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00693 
00694       return;
00695 
00696 }

00700 void DisplayFileMessage( void )
00701 {
00702   
00703   
00704       
00705       
00706 
00707       // get the currently selected message 
00708   if(iHighLightFileLine!=-1)
00709   {
00710             // display text
00711     DisplayFormattedText( );
00712       }
00713       else
00714       {
00715             HandleFileViewerButtonStates( );
00716       }
00717   
00718       // reset shadow
00719       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00720 
00721       return;
00722 }

00724 
00725 void InitializeFilesMouseRegions( void )
00726 {
00727       INT32 iCounter=0;
00728       // init mouseregions
00729       for(iCounter=0; iCounter <MAX_FILES_PAGE; iCounter++)
00730       {
00731        MSYS_DefineRegion(&pFilesRegions[iCounter],FILES_LIST_X ,(INT16)iScreenHeightOffset + (FILES_LIST_Y + iCounter * ( BLOCK_HEIGHT + 2 ) ), FILES_LIST_X + FILES_LIST_WIDTH ,(INT16)iScreenHeightOffset + (FILES_LIST_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( BLOCK_HEIGHT + 2 ) ),
00732                   MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL+2,MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, FilesBtnCallBack );
00733         MSYS_AddRegion(&pFilesRegions[iCounter]);
00734             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&pFilesRegions[iCounter],0,iCounter);
00735       }
00736   
00737       
00738       return;
00739 }
00740 
00741 void RemoveFilesMouseRegions( void )
00742 {
00743   INT32 iCounter=0;
00744   for(iCounter=0; iCounter <MAX_FILES_PAGE; iCounter++)
00745       {
00746        MSYS_RemoveRegion( &pFilesRegions[iCounter]);
00747       }
00748 }
00749 
00750 void FilesBtnCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00751 { 
00752   INT32 iFileId = -1;
00753       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00754   FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead; 
00755   
00756       
00757       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00758   {
00759        return;
00760   }
00761   
00762       
00763       if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00764   {
00765 
00766             // left button 
00767        iFileId = MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
00768    
00769        // reset iHighLightListLine
00770    iHighLightFileLine = -1;
00771 
00772        if( iHighLightFileLine == iFileId )
00773        {
00774              return;
00775        }
00776 
00777 
00778        // make sure is a valid 
00779        while( pFilesList )
00780    {
00781 
00782              // if iCounter = iFileId, is a valid file
00783      if( iCounter == iFileId )
00784              {
00785                    giFilesPage = 0;
00786                    iHighLightFileLine = iFileId;
00787              }
00788 
00789              // next element in list
00790              pFilesList = pFilesList->Next;
00791 
00792              // increment counter
00793              iCounter++;
00794        }
00795    
00796        fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
00797 
00798       
00799        return;
00800   }
00801 
00802 }
00803 
00804 
00805 BOOLEAN DisplayFormattedText( void )
00806 {
00807   FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead; 
00808   
00809       UINT16 usFirstWidth = 0;
00810       UINT16 usFirstHeight = 0;
00811   UINT16 usSecondWidth;
00812       UINT16 usSecondHeight;
00813       INT16 sTextWidth = 0;
00814       INT32 iCounter=0;
00815   INT32 iLength=0;
00816       INT32 iHeight=0;
00817       INT32 iOffSet=0;
00818       INT32 iMessageCode;
00819       wchar_t sString[2048];
00820   HVOBJECT hHandle;
00821   UINT32 uiFirstTempPicture;
00822       UINT32 uiSecondTempPicture;
00823   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00824   INT16 usFreeSpace = 0;
00825       static INT32 iOldMessageCode = 0;
00826 
00827       fWaitAFrame = FALSE;
00828 
00829       // get the file that was highlighted
00830   while(iCounter < iHighLightFileLine)
00831       {
00832         iCounter++;
00833             pFilesList=pFilesList->Next;
00834       }
00835 
00836   // message code found, reset counter 
00837   iMessageCode = pFilesList->ubCode;
00838       iCounter=0;
00839   
00840   // set file as read
00841       pFilesList->fRead = TRUE;
00842 
00843       // clear the file string structure list
00844   // get file background object
00845       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiFileBack);
00846   
00847       // blt background to screen
00848       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, FILE_VIEWER_X, FILE_VIEWER_Y - 4, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00849 
00850   // get the offset in the file
00851   while( iCounter < iMessageCode)
00852       {
00853         // increment increment offset
00854     iOffSet+=ubFileRecordsLength[iCounter];
00855 
00856             // increment counter 
00857             iCounter++;
00858       }
00859 
00860       iLength = ubFileRecordsLength[pFilesList->ubCode];
00861 
00862       if( pFilesList->ubFormat < ENRICO_BACKGROUND )
00863       {
00864         
00865         LoadEncryptedDataFromFile("BINARYDATA\\Files.edt", sString, FILE_STRING_SIZE * (iOffSet) * 2, FILE_STRING_SIZE * iLength * 2);
00866       }
00867 
00868       // reset counter
00869       iCounter=0;
00870     
00871       // no shadow
00872       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
00873 
00874   switch( pFilesList->ubFormat )
00875       {
00876          case 0:
00877            
00878                    // no format, all text
00879 
00880                    while(iLength > iCounter)
00881                    {
00882          // read one record from file manager file
00883                  LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Files.edt", sString, FILE_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ) * 2, FILE_STRING_SIZE * 2 );
00884                
00885                  // display string and get height
00886              iHeight += IanDisplayWrappedString(FILE_VIEWER_X + 4, ( UINT16 )( FILE_VIEWER_Y + iHeight ), FILE_VIEWER_WIDTH, FILE_GAP, FILES_TEXT_FONT, FILE_TEXT_COLOR, sString,0,FALSE,0);
00887                         
00888                  // increment file record counter
00889                  iCounter++;
00890                    }
00891           break;
00892       
00893      case 1:
00894 
00895                    // second format, one picture, all text below
00896 
00897        // load graphic
00898                    VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00899            FilenameForBPP( pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[ 0 ], VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00900            CHECKF(AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiFirstTempPicture ) );
00901        
00902        GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( uiFirstTempPicture, 0, &usFirstWidth,  &usFirstHeight );
00903        
00904 
00905                    // get file background object
00906            GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiFirstTempPicture);
00907   
00908            // blt background to screen
00909            BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, FILE_VIEWER_X + 4 + ( FILE_VIEWER_WIDTH - usFirstWidth ) / 2, FILE_VIEWER_Y + 10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00910        
00911                    iHeight = usFirstHeight + 20;
00912 
00913 
00914                    while(iLength > iCounter)
00915                    {
00916 
00917          // read one record from file manager file
00918                  LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Files.edt", sString, FILE_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ) * 2, FILE_STRING_SIZE * 2 );
00919                
00920                  // display string and get height
00921              iHeight += IanDisplayWrappedString(FILE_VIEWER_X + 4, ( UINT16 )( FILE_VIEWER_Y + iHeight ), FILE_VIEWER_WIDTH, FILE_GAP, FILES_TEXT_FONT, FILE_TEXT_COLOR, sString,0,FALSE,0);
00922                         
00923                  // increment file record counter
00924                  iCounter++;
00925                    }
00926 
00927        // delete video object
00928                    DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiFirstTempPicture );
00929                    
00930              break;
00931              case 2:
00932   
00933                    // third format, two pictures, side by side with all text below
00934        
00935                    // load first graphic
00936                    VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00937            FilenameForBPP( pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[ 0 ], VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00938            CHECKF(AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiFirstTempPicture));
00939        
00940                    // load second graphic 
00941                    VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00942            FilenameForBPP( pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[ 1 ] , VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00943            CHECKF(AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiSecondTempPicture ) );
00944   
00945        GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( uiFirstTempPicture, 0, &usFirstWidth,  &usFirstHeight );
00946                    GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( uiSecondTempPicture, 0, &usSecondWidth,  &usSecondHeight );
00947 
00948        // get free space;
00949                    usFreeSpace = FILE_VIEWER_WIDTH - usFirstWidth - usSecondWidth;
00950 
00951                    usFreeSpace /= 3;
00952         // get file background object
00953            GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiFirstTempPicture);
00954   
00955 
00956            // blt background to screen
00957            BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, FILE_VIEWER_X + usFreeSpace, FILE_VIEWER_Y + 10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00958        
00959         // get file background object
00960            GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiSecondTempPicture);
00961        
00962                    // get position for second picture
00963                    usFreeSpace *= 2;
00964                    usFreeSpace += usFirstWidth;
00965        
00966                    // blt background to screen
00967            BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, FILE_VIEWER_X + usFreeSpace, FILE_VIEWER_Y + 10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00968        
00969 
00970 
00971        // delete video object
00972                    DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(uiFirstTempPicture);
00973                    DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(uiSecondTempPicture); 
00974 
00975                    // put in text
00976                     iHeight = usFirstHeight + 20;
00977 
00978 
00979                    while(iLength > iCounter)
00980                    {
00981 
00982          // read one record from file manager file
00983                  LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\Files.edt", sString, FILE_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffSet + iCounter ) * 2, FILE_STRING_SIZE * 2 );
00984                
00985                  // display string and get height
00986              iHeight += IanDisplayWrappedString(FILE_VIEWER_X + 4, ( UINT16 )( FILE_VIEWER_Y + iHeight ), FILE_VIEWER_WIDTH, FILE_GAP, FILES_TEXT_FONT, FILE_TEXT_COLOR, sString,0,FALSE,0);
00987                         
00988                  // increment file record counter
00989                  iCounter++;
00990                    }
00991 
00992 
00993              break;
00994      
00995              case 3:
00996                // picture on the left, with text on right and below
00997         // load first graphic
00998                    HandleSpecialTerroristFile( pFilesList->ubCode, pFilesList->pPicFileNameList[ 0 ] );
00999              break;
01000              default:
01001                    HandleSpecialFiles( pFilesList -> ubFormat );
01002      break;
01003 
01004       }
01005 
01006       HandleFileViewerButtonStates( );
01007       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01008       
01009       return ( TRUE );
01010 }
01011 
01012 
01013 BOOLEAN HandleSpecialFiles( UINT8 ubFormat )
01014 {
01015       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01016   wchar_t sString[2048];
01017       FileStringPtr pTempString = NULL ;
01018       FileStringPtr pLocatorString = NULL;
01019       INT32 iTotalYPosition = 0;
01020       INT32 iYPositionOnPage = 0;
01021       INT32 iFileLineWidth = 0;
01022       INT32 iFileStartX = 0;
01023       UINT32 uiFlags = 0;
01024       UINT32 uiFont = 0;
01025       BOOLEAN fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
01026       FileRecordWidthPtr WidthList = NULL;
01027 
01028 
01029       UINT32 uiPicture;
01030       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01031       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
01032       
01033 
01034       ClearFileStringList( );
01035 
01036       switch( ubFormat )
01037       {
01038             case( 255 ):
01039                   // load data
01040                   // read one record from file manager file
01041 
01042                   WidthList = CreateWidthRecordsForAruloIntelFile( );
01043               while( iCounter < LENGTH_OF_ENRICO_FILE )
01044                   {
01045                     LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\RIS.EDT", sString, FILE_STRING_SIZE * ( iCounter ) * 2, FILE_STRING_SIZE * 2 );
01046                         AddStringToFilesList( sString );
01047                         iCounter++;
01048                   }
01049 
01050                   pTempString = pFileStringList;
01051 
01052             
01053               iYPositionOnPage = 0;
01054                   iCounter = 0;
01055                   pLocatorString = pTempString;
01056 
01057                   pTempString = GetFirstStringOnThisPage( pFileStringList,FILES_TEXT_FONT,  350, FILE_GAP, giFilesPage, MAX_FILE_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE, WidthList);
01058 
01059                   // find out where this string is
01060                   while( pLocatorString != pTempString )
01061                   {
01062                         iCounter++;
01063                         pLocatorString = pLocatorString->Next;
01064                   }
01065 
01066 
01067                   // move through list and display
01068                   while( pTempString )
01069                   {
01070                         uiFlags = IAN_WRAP_NO_SHADOW;
01071                                     // copy over string 
01072                         wcscpy( sString, pTempString->pString );
01073                         
01074                         if( sString[ 0 ] == 0 )
01075                         {
01076                               // on last page
01077                               fOnLastFilesPageFlag = TRUE;
01078                         }
01079                         
01080                         
01081                         // set up font
01082                         uiFont = FILES_TEXT_FONT;
01083                         if( giFilesPage == 0 )
01084                         {
01085                           switch( iCounter )
01086                               {
01087                             case( 0 ):
01088                                       uiFont = FILES_TITLE_FONT;
01089                                break;
01090                               
01091                               }
01092                         }
01093 
01094                         // reset width
01095                         iFileLineWidth = 350;
01096                         iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X +  10 );
01097 
01098                         // based on the record we are at, selected X start position and the width to wrap the line, to fit around pictures
01099 
01100                         if( iCounter == 0 )
01101                         {
01102                               // title
01103                               iFileLineWidth = 350;
01104                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  10 );
01105                         
01106                         }
01107                         else if( iCounter == 1 )
01108                         {
01109                               // opening on first page
01110                               iFileLineWidth = 350;
01111                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  10 );
01112                               
01113                         }
01114                         else if( ( iCounter > 1) &&( iCounter < FILES_COUNTER_1_WIDTH ) )
01115                         {
01116                               iFileLineWidth = 350;
01117                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  10 );
01118                         
01119                         }
01120                         else if( iCounter == FILES_COUNTER_1_WIDTH )
01121                         {
01122                               if( giFilesPage == 0 )
01123                               {
01124                                     iYPositionOnPage += ( MAX_FILE_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE - iYPositionOnPage );
01125                               }
01126                               iFileLineWidth = 350;
01127                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  10 );
01128                         }
01129                         
01130                         else if( iCounter == FILES_COUNTER_2_WIDTH )
01131                         {
01132                               iFileLineWidth = 200;
01133                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  150 );
01134                         }
01135                         else if( iCounter == FILES_COUNTER_3_WIDTH )
01136                         {
01137                               iFileLineWidth = 200;
01138                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  150 );
01139                         }
01140                         
01141                         else
01142                         {
01143                               iFileLineWidth = 350;
01144                               iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X +  10 );
01145                         }
01146                         // not far enough, advance
01147                         
01148                         if( ( iYPositionOnPage + IanWrappedStringHeight(0, 0, ( UINT16 )iFileLineWidth, FILE_GAP, 
01149                                                                                             uiFont, 0, sString, 
01150                                                                                            0, 0, 0 ) )  < MAX_FILE_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE  )
01151                         {
01152            // now print it
01153                    iYPositionOnPage += ( INT32 )IanDisplayWrappedString((UINT16) ( iFileStartX ), ( UINT16 )( FILE_VIEWER_Y + iYPositionOnPage), ( INT16 )iFileLineWidth, FILE_GAP, uiFont, FILE_TEXT_COLOR, sString,0,FALSE, uiFlags );
01154 
01155                            fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
01156                         }
01157                     else
01158                         {
01159                            // gonna get cut off...end now
01160                            fGoingOffCurrentPage = TRUE;
01161                         }
01162 
01163                         pTempString = pTempString ->Next;
01164                                           
01165                         if( pTempString == NULL )
01166                         {
01167                               // on last page
01168                               fOnLastFilesPageFlag = TRUE;
01169                         }
01170                         else
01171                         {
01172                               fOnLastFilesPageFlag = FALSE;
01173                         }
01174 
01175                         // going over the edge, stop now
01176                         if( fGoingOffCurrentPage == TRUE )
01177                         {
01178                               pTempString = NULL;
01179                         }
01180                         iCounter++;
01181                   }     
01182                   ClearOutWidthRecordsList( WidthList );
01183                   ClearFileStringList( );
01184             break;
01185       }
01186 
01187       // place pictures
01188       // page 1 picture of country
01189       if( giFilesPage == 0 )
01190       {
01191             // title bar
01192             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01193             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\ArucoFilesMap.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01194             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiPicture));
01195 
01196             // get title bar object
01197         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiPicture);
01198   
01199         // blt title bar to screen
01200         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,iScreenWidthOffset + 300, iScreenHeightOffset + 270, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01201       
01202             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiPicture );
01203 
01204       }
01205       else if( giFilesPage == 4 )
01206       {
01207             // kid pic
01208             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01209             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Enrico_Y.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01210             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiPicture));
01211 
01212             // get title bar object
01213         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiPicture);
01214   
01215         // blt title bar to screen
01216         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,iScreenWidthOffset + 260, iScreenHeightOffset + 225, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01217       
01218             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiPicture );
01219 
01220       }
01221       else if( giFilesPage == 5 )
01222       {
01223 
01224             
01225                   // wedding pic
01226             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01227             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Enrico_W.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01228             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiPicture));
01229 
01230             // get title bar object
01231         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiPicture);
01232   
01233         // blt title bar to screen
01234         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,iScreenWidthOffset + 260, iScreenHeightOffset + 85, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01235       
01236             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiPicture );
01237       }
01238       
01239       return ( TRUE );
01240 }
01241 
01242 
01243 void AddStringToFilesList( STR16 pString )
01244 {
01245 
01246       FileStringPtr pFileString;
01247   FileStringPtr pTempString = pFileStringList;
01248 
01249       // create string structure
01250       pFileString = (FileStringPtr) MemAlloc( sizeof( FileString ) );
01251       
01252       
01253   // alloc string and copy
01254       pFileString-> pString = (STR16) MemAlloc( ( wcslen( pString ) * 2 ) + 2 );
01255       wcscpy( pFileString->pString, pString );
01256       pFileString->pString[ wcslen( pString ) ] = 0;
01257 
01258       // set Next to NULL
01259 
01260       pFileString -> Next = NULL;
01261       if( pFileStringList == NULL )
01262       {
01263             pFileStringList = pFileString;
01264       }
01265       else
01266       {
01267             while( pTempString -> Next )
01268             {
01269                   pTempString = pTempString -> Next;
01270             }
01271             pTempString->Next = pFileString;
01272       }
01273 
01274 
01275       return;
01276 }
01277 
01278 
01279 void ClearFileStringList( void )
01280 {
01281       FileStringPtr pFileString;
01282       FileStringPtr pDeleteFileString;
01283 
01284       pFileString = pFileStringList;
01285 
01286       if( pFileString == NULL )
01287       {
01288             return;
01289       }
01290       while( pFileString -> Next)
01291       {
01292             pDeleteFileString = pFileString;
01293             pFileString = pFileString -> Next;
01294             MemFree( pDeleteFileString );
01295       }
01296 
01297       // last one
01298       MemFree( pFileString );
01299 
01300       pFileStringList = NULL;
01301 
01302 
01303 }
01304

01306 void CreateButtonsForFilesPage( void )
01307 {
01308       // will create buttons for the files page
01309       giFilesPageButtonsImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\arrows.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
01310       giFilesPageButtons[0] = QuickCreateButton( giFilesPageButtonsImage[0], PREVIOUS_FILE_PAGE_BUTTON_X,  PREVIOUS_FILE_PAGE_BUTTON_Y,
01311                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01312                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnPreviousFilePageCallback );
01313 
01314       giFilesPageButtonsImage[ 1 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\arrows.sti" ,-1,6,-1,7,-1 );
01315       giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( giFilesPageButtonsImage[ 1 ], NEXT_FILE_PAGE_BUTTON_X,  NEXT_FILE_PAGE_BUTTON_Y ,
01316                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
01317                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnNextFilePageCallback );
01318 
01319       SetButtonCursor(giFilesPageButtons[ 0 ], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
01320       SetButtonCursor(giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
01321 
01322       return;
01323 }

01341 
01342 // callbacks
01343 void BtnPreviousFilePageCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01344 {
01345   if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01346             return;
01347 
01348       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01349       {
01350 
01351             if( fWaitAFrame == TRUE )
01352             {
01353                   return;
01354             }
01355 
01356             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01357             { 
01358                   btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01359             }
01360     
01361       }
01362       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01363       {
01364 
01365             if( fWaitAFrame == TRUE )
01366             {
01367                   return;
01368             }
01369 
01370             if((btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01371             { 
01372 
01373                   if( giFilesPage > 0 )
01374                   {
01375                    giFilesPage--;
01376                         fWaitAFrame = TRUE;
01377                   }
01378 
01379                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01380                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01381                   MarkButtonsDirty( );
01382             }
01383   }
01384 
01385       return;
01386 }
01387 
01388 
01389 void BtnNextFilePageCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01390 {
01391   if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01392             return;
01393 
01394       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01395       {
01396             if( fWaitAFrame == TRUE )
01397             {
01398                   return;
01399             }
01400 
01401             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01402             { 
01403                    btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01404             }
01405    
01406       }
01407       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01408       {
01409             if( fWaitAFrame == TRUE )
01410             {
01411                   return;
01412             }
01413 
01414             if((btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01415             { 
01416 
01417                   if(  ( fOnLastFilesPageFlag ) == FALSE )
01418                   {
01419                         fWaitAFrame = TRUE;
01420                         giFilesPage++;
01421                   }
01422 
01423                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01424                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01425                   MarkButtonsDirty( );
01426             }
01427       }
01428 
01429       return;
01430 }
01431 
01432 void HandleFileViewerButtonStates( void )
01433 {
01434       // handle state of email viewer buttons
01435 
01436       if( iHighLightFileLine == -1 )
01437       {
01438             // not displaying message, leave
01439             DisableButton( giFilesPageButtons[ 0 ] );
01440             DisableButton( giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ] );
01441             ButtonList[ giFilesPageButtons[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01442             ButtonList[ giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01443 
01444 
01445             return;
01446       }
01447 
01448       // turn off previous page button
01449       if( giFilesPage == 0 )
01450       {
01451             DisableButton( giFilesPageButtons[ 0 ] );
01452             ButtonList[ giFilesPageButtons[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01453 
01454       }
01455       else
01456       {
01457             EnableButton( giFilesPageButtons[ 0 ] );
01458       }
01459 
01460 
01461       // turn off next page button
01462       if( fOnLastFilesPageFlag == TRUE )
01463       {
01464             DisableButton( giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ] );
01465             ButtonList[ giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01466       }
01467       else
01468       {
01469             EnableButton( giFilesPageButtons[ 1 ] );
01470       }
01471 
01472       return;
01473 
01474 }

01477 FileRecordWidthPtr CreateRecordWidth(     INT32 iRecordNumber, INT32 iRecordWidth, INT32 iRecordHeightAdjustment, UINT8 ubFlags)
01478 {
01479       FileRecordWidthPtr pTempRecord = NULL;
01480 
01481       // allocs and inits a width info record for the multipage file viewer...this will tell the procedure that does inital computation on which record is the start of the current page
01482       // how wide special records are ( ones that share space with pictures )
01483       pTempRecord = (FileRecordWidthPtr) MemAlloc( sizeof( FileRecordWidth ) );
01484 
01485       pTempRecord -> Next = NULL;
01486       pTempRecord -> iRecordNumber = iRecordNumber;
01487       pTempRecord -> iRecordWidth = iRecordWidth;
01488       pTempRecord -> iRecordHeightAdjustment = iRecordHeightAdjustment;
01489       pTempRecord -> ubFlags = ubFlags;
01490 
01491       return ( pTempRecord );
01492 }
01493 
01494 FileRecordWidthPtr CreateWidthRecordsForAruloIntelFile( void )
01495 {
01496       // this fucntion will create the width list for the Arulco intelligence file
01497       FileRecordWidthPtr pTempRecord = NULL;
01498       FileRecordWidthPtr pRecordListHead = NULL;
01499 
01500       
01501             // first record width
01502 //    pTempRecord = CreateRecordWidth( 7, 350, 200,0 );
01503       pTempRecord = CreateRecordWidth( FILES_COUNTER_1_WIDTH, 350, MAX_FILE_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE,0 );
01504 
01505       // set up head of list now
01506       pRecordListHead = pTempRecord;
01507       
01508       // next record
01509 //    pTempRecord -> Next = CreateRecordWidth( 43, 200,0, 0 );
01510       pTempRecord -> Next = CreateRecordWidth( FILES_COUNTER_2_WIDTH, 200,0, 0 );
01511       pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next;
01512 
01513       // and the next..
01514 //    pTempRecord -> Next = CreateRecordWidth( 45, 200,0, 0 );
01515       pTempRecord -> Next = CreateRecordWidth( FILES_COUNTER_3_WIDTH, 200,0, 0 );
01516       pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next;
01517 
01518       return( pRecordListHead );
01519 
01520 }
01521 
01522 FileRecordWidthPtr CreateWidthRecordsForTerroristFile( void )
01523 {
01524       // this fucntion will create the width list for the Arulco intelligence file
01525       FileRecordWidthPtr pTempRecord = NULL;
01526       FileRecordWidthPtr pRecordListHead = NULL;
01527 
01528       
01529             // first record width
01530       pTempRecord = CreateRecordWidth( 4, 170, 0,0 );
01531 
01532       // set up head of list now
01533       pRecordListHead = pTempRecord;
01534       
01535       // next record
01536       pTempRecord -> Next = CreateRecordWidth( 5, 170,0, 0 );
01537       pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next;
01538 
01539       pTempRecord -> Next = CreateRecordWidth( 6, 170,0, 0 );
01540       pTempRecord = pTempRecord->Next;
01541       
01542       
01543       return( pRecordListHead );
01544 
01545 }
01546 
01547 
01548 void ClearOutWidthRecordsList( FileRecordWidthPtr pFileRecordWidthList )
01549 {
01550       FileRecordWidthPtr pTempRecord = NULL;
01551       FileRecordWidthPtr pDeleteRecord = NULL;
01552 
01553       // set up to head of the list
01554       pTempRecord = pDeleteRecord = pFileRecordWidthList;
01555 
01556       // error check
01557       if( pFileRecordWidthList == NULL )
01558       {
01559             return;
01560       }
01561 
01562       while( pTempRecord -> Next )
01563       {
01564             // set up delete record
01565             pDeleteRecord = pTempRecord;
01566 
01567             // move to next record
01568             pTempRecord = pTempRecord -> Next;
01569 
01570             MemFree( pDeleteRecord );
01571       }
01572 
01573       // now get the last element
01574       MemFree( pTempRecord );
01575 
01576       // null out passed ptr
01577       pFileRecordWidthList = NULL;
01578 
01579 
01580       return;
01581 }

01583 
01584 void OpenFirstUnreadFile( void )
01585 {
01586       // open the first unread file in the list
01587       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01588       FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead; 
01589 
01590       // make sure is a valid 
01591        while( pFilesList )
01592    {
01593 
01594              // if iCounter = iFileId, is a valid file
01595      if(  pFilesList -> fRead == FALSE )
01596              {
01597                    iHighLightFileLine = iCounter;
01598              }
01599 
01600              // next element in list
01601              pFilesList = pFilesList->Next;
01602 
01603              // increment counter
01604              iCounter++;
01605        }
01606       
01607       return;
01608 }
01609 
01610 
01611 void CheckForUnreadFiles( void )
01612 {
01613       BOOLEAN     fStatusOfNewFileFlag = fNewFilesInFileViewer;
01614 
01615       // willc heck for any unread files and set flag if any
01616       FilesUnitPtr pFilesList=pFilesListHead;
01617       
01618       fNewFilesInFileViewer = FALSE;
01619 
01620 
01621       while( pFilesList )
01622   {
01623             // unread?...if so, set flag
01624             if( pFilesList -> fRead == FALSE )
01625             {
01626                   fNewFilesInFileViewer = TRUE;
01627             }
01628             // next element in list
01629             pFilesList = pFilesList->Next;
01630       }
01631 
01632       //if the old flag and the new flag arent the same, either create or destory the fast help region
01633       if( fNewFilesInFileViewer != fStatusOfNewFileFlag )
01634       {
01635             CreateFileAndNewEmailIconFastHelpText( LAPTOP_BN_HLP_TXT_YOU_HAVE_NEW_FILE, (BOOLEAN)!fNewFilesInFileViewer );
01636       }
01637 }
01638 
01639 BOOLEAN HandleSpecialTerroristFile( INT32 iFileNumber, STR sPictureName )
01640 {
01641 
01642       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01643   wchar_t sString[2048];
01644       FileStringPtr pTempString = NULL ;
01645       FileStringPtr pLocatorString = NULL;
01646       INT32 iTotalYPosition = 0;
01647       INT32 iYPositionOnPage = 0;
01648       INT32 iFileLineWidth = 0;
01649       INT32 iFileStartX = 0;
01650       UINT32 uiFlags = 0;
01651       UINT32 uiFont = 0;
01652       BOOLEAN fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
01653       FileRecordWidthPtr WidthList = NULL;
01654       INT32 iOffset = 0;
01655       UINT32 uiPicture;
01656       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01657       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
01658       CHAR sTemp[ 128 ];
01659 
01660       iOffset = ubFileOffsets[ iFileNumber ] ;
01661 
01662       // grab width list
01663       WidthList = CreateWidthRecordsForTerroristFile( );
01664       
01665       
01666       while( iCounter < ubFileRecordsLength[ iFileNumber ] )
01667       {
01668             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( "BINARYDATA\\files.EDT", sString, FILE_STRING_SIZE * ( iOffset + iCounter ) * 2, FILE_STRING_SIZE * 2 );
01669             AddStringToFilesList( sString );
01670             iCounter++;
01671       }
01672 
01673       pTempString = pFileStringList;
01674 
01675       
01676       iYPositionOnPage = 0;
01677       iCounter = 0;
01678       pLocatorString = pTempString;
01679 
01680       pTempString = GetFirstStringOnThisPage( pFileStringList,FILES_TEXT_FONT,  350, FILE_GAP, giFilesPage, MAX_FILE_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE, WidthList);
01681 
01682             // find out where this string is
01683             while( pLocatorString != pTempString )
01684             {
01685                   iCounter++;
01686                   pLocatorString = pLocatorString -> Next;
01687             }
01688 
01689 
01690             // move through list and display
01691             while( pTempString )
01692             {
01693                   uiFlags = IAN_WRAP_NO_SHADOW;
01694                               // copy over string 
01695                   wcscpy( sString, pTempString -> pString );
01696                   
01697                   if( sString[ 0 ] == 0 )
01698                   {
01699                         // on last page
01700                         fOnLastFilesPageFlag = TRUE;
01701                   }
01702                   
01703                   
01704                   // set up font
01705                   uiFont = FILES_TEXT_FONT;
01706                   if( giFilesPage == 0 )
01707                   {
01708                         switch( iCounter )
01709                         {
01710                           case( 0 ):
01711                                     uiFont = FILES_TITLE_FONT;
01712                          break;
01713                         
01714                         }
01715                   }
01716 
01717                   if( ( iCounter > 3 ) && ( iCounter < 7 ) )
01718                   {
01719                         iFileLineWidth = 170;
01720                         iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X  +  180 );
01721                   }
01722                   else
01723                   {
01724                         // reset width
01725                         iFileLineWidth = 350;
01726                         iFileStartX = (UINT16) ( FILE_VIEWER_X +  10 );
01727                   }
01728 
01729                   // based on the record we are at, selected X start position and the width to wrap the line, to fit around pictures
01730                   if( ( iYPositionOnPage + IanWrappedStringHeight(0, 0, ( UINT16 )iFileLineWidth, FILE_GAP, 
01731                                                                                           uiFont, 0, sString, 
01732                                                                                      0, 0, 0 ) )  < MAX_FILE_MESSAGE_PAGE_SIZE  )
01733                   {
01734          // now print it
01735                  iYPositionOnPage += ( INT32 )IanDisplayWrappedString((UINT16) ( iFileStartX ), ( UINT16 )( FILE_VIEWER_Y + iYPositionOnPage), ( INT16 )iFileLineWidth, FILE_GAP, uiFont, FILE_TEXT_COLOR, sString,0,FALSE, uiFlags );
01736 
01737                          fGoingOffCurrentPage = FALSE;
01738                   }
01739                   else
01740                   {
01741                          // gonna get cut off...end now
01742                          fGoingOffCurrentPage = TRUE;
01743                   }
01744 
01745                   pTempString = pTempString ->Next;
01746                                     
01747                   if( ( pTempString == NULL ) && ( fGoingOffCurrentPage == FALSE ) )
01748                   {
01749                         // on last page
01750                         fOnLastFilesPageFlag = TRUE;
01751                   }
01752                   else
01753                   {
01754                         fOnLastFilesPageFlag = FALSE;
01755                   }
01756 
01757                   // going over the edge, stop now
01758                   if( fGoingOffCurrentPage == TRUE )
01759                   {
01760                         pTempString = NULL;
01761                   }
01762 
01763                   // show picture
01764                   if( ( giFilesPage == 0 ) && ( iCounter == 5 ) )
01765                   {
01766                         if( usProfileIdsForTerroristFiles[ iFileNumber + 1 ] < 100 )
01767                         {
01768                               sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", "FACES\\BIGFACES\\",     usProfileIdsForTerroristFiles[ iFileNumber + 1 ]);
01769                         }
01770                         else
01771                         {
01772                               sprintf(sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", "FACES\\BIGFACES\\",     usProfileIdsForTerroristFiles[ iFileNumber + 1 ]);
01773                         }
01774                         
01775             
01776                         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01777                         FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01778                         CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiPicture));
01779 
01780                         //Blt face to screen to 
01781                         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiPicture);
01782 
01783 //def: 3/24/99
01784 //                      BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,( INT16 ) (  FILE_VIEWER_X +  30 ), ( INT16 ) ( iYPositionOnPage + 5), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01785                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,( INT16 ) (  FILE_VIEWER_X +  30 ), ( INT16 ) ( iYPositionOnPage + 21), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01786 
01787                         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiPicture ); 
01788 
01789                         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01790                         FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\InterceptBorder.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01791                         CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiPicture));
01792 
01793                         //Blt face to screen to 
01794                         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiPicture);
01795 
01796                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,( INT16 ) (  FILE_VIEWER_X +  25 ), ( INT16 ) ( iYPositionOnPage + 16 ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01797 
01798                         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiPicture ); 
01799                   }
01800 
01801                   iCounter++;
01802             }     
01803             
01804             
01805             
01806             ClearOutWidthRecordsList( WidthList );
01807             ClearFileStringList( );
01808 
01809             return( TRUE );
01810 }
01811 
01812 // add a file about this terrorist
01813 BOOLEAN AddFileAboutTerrorist( INT32 iProfileId )
01814 {
01815       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01816 
01817       for( iCounter = 1; iCounter < 7; iCounter++ )
01818       {
01819             if( usProfileIdsForTerroristFiles[ iCounter ] == iProfileId )
01820             {
01821                   // checked, and this file is there
01822                         AddFilesToPlayersLog( ( UINT8 )iCounter, 0, 3, NULL, NULL );
01823                         return( TRUE );
01824             }
01825       }
01826 
01827       return( FALSE );
01828 }
